H0.text: Which band released a 2001 album entitled ‘Amnesiac’. Radiohead

H1.text: Which band released a 2001 album entitled ‘Amnesiac’. Muse

H2.text: Which band released a 2001 album entitled ‘Amnesiac’. Foo Fighters

H3.text: Which band released a 2001 album entitled ‘Amnesiac’. RHMB

A4.text: Amnesiac was released in May 2001, topping the UK charts and producing the singles 'Pyramid Song' and 'Knives Out'.

A5.text: Hail to the Thief was released in June 2003, ending Radiohead's contract with EMI.
